Playbook

Our guide to collaborative coding and project management

Get Started About

👁 Clear

Our guide is clear and concise, utilizing simple language and avoiding jargon.

🤝 Collaborative

We adopt a collaborative approach to writing our guide, managing our content through GitHub.

♻️ Reusable

Our guide employs a modular approach, written in Markdown for ease of content creation and updates.

🌍 Open

We embrace an open approach to our guide, sharing our content under an open source license.

📈 Relevant

Our content remains relevant through the use of a versioning system, ensuring it evolves with user needs.

👥 Accessible

We ensure our guide is accessible by using a static site generator, making it available to everyone.

⏱ Up-to-date

Our guide stays current through the use of continuous integration systems for automatic content updates.

🔎 Searchable

We make our guide easily searchable by employing a search engine to index our content.

📱 Responsive

Our guide features a mobile-first, responsive design to ensure accessibility on all devices.
